name: Falooda
description: A popular Indian dessert drink made with milk, vermicelli and rose syrup
directions: Soak the sweet basil seeds for 20-30 minutes. After that, strain the seeds to remove extra water.
Break/chop the vermicelli noodles and cook them till they are soft.
Add 1.5 to 2 tablespoons of rose syrup in a serving glass as per the sweetness required.
Add 2 tablespoons of the soaked sweet basil seeds. Then add 2 to 3 tablespoons of cooked vermicelli noodles.
Pour 1 cup of chilled milk and stir gently.
Finally, add a scoop of your preferred ice cream and garnish with chopped nuts.
